headline: Colgate-Palmolive Webcasts Fireside Chat at the UBS Global Consumer and Retail Conference 2025
summary: NEW YORK- Colgate-Palmolive Chief Investor Relations Officer and EVP, M&A, John Faucher, will participate in a fireside chat at the UBS Global Consumer and Retail Conference on Wednesday, March 12,...
